flags.title: Unsatisfactory Images
flags.text: This project guide has low-quality images. Pictures need to be either re-edited or re-taken.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This process will allow you to run third-party apps. You will also be able to do other things that Apple doesn't want you to be able to do and have more fun on your device.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This process will allow you to run third-party apps. You will also be able to do other things that Apple doesn't want you to be able to do and have more fun on your device.

Relevant parts
  • IPod USB connector
Tools
  • Computer
  • Internet connection

lines.text: First, go to greenpois0n.com  and download the software for your Mac or Windows computer.
lines.text_raw: First, go to greenpois0n.com  and download the software for your Mac or Windows computer.

lines.text: Plug your Apple device into your computer.
lines.text_raw: Plug your Apple device into your computer.

lines.text: Now that you have downloaded the software and plugged in your device you are ready to start jailbreaking.
lines.text_raw: Now that you have downloaded the software and plugged in your device you are ready to start jailbreaking.

lines.text: Next, run the Greenpois0n software, and turn off your device.
lines.text_raw: Next, run the Greenpois0n software, and turn off your device.

lines.text: Once you have done that click on "Prepare to jailbreak." Follow all directions on the screen!
lines.text_raw: Once you have done that click on "Prepare to jailbreak." Follow all directions on the screen!

lines.text: Then, click on "Jailbreak," and wait for your device.
lines.text_raw: Then, click on "Jailbreak," and wait for your device.

lines.text: Lastly, make sure that your device has Cydia installed.
lines.text_raw: Lastly, make sure that your device has Cydia installed.

lines.text: If it does then you're done! If it doesn't, try again.
lines.text_raw: If it does then you're done! If it doesn't, try again.

guide.summary: Get more out of your Apple device!
guide.title: Jailbreak an iPhone, iPod Touch, or iPad
